readable.title: 2802337003_56e555cd30
readable.content: A boy wearing brown shorts pouring water over his head . A child in a standing in a stream dumps a bucket of water on his or her head . A person is taking a blue bucket full of water and pouring it over themselves . A young boy dumping a pail of water over his head . A young child is standing in a river pouring a large green bucket of water over his head .
